description.en: NES, PlayStation, Sega Saturn...High school girls today, fascinated by the retro games that once captivated the world, passionately discuss their passion for games! Will it be rivalry or friendship that develops between them?!

Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger, Suzukaze Aoba, a high school graduate, begins working as a character designer for the game's developer, Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development, she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department, as well as those from across the company.

title.en: Ore no Genjitsu wa Ren’ai Game??: ka to Omottara Inochigake no Game datta

altTitles.ru: Мир, который я считал симулятором свиданий, оказался смертельной игрой

altTitles.ja: 俺の現実は恋愛ゲーム？？　～かと思ったら命がけのゲームだった～

altTitles.en: A Dating Sim of Life or Death
Is My Reality a Love Game?? ~I Thought it Was a Life Like Game~

description.en:
One day, 25-year-old Hasegawa Ryou wakes up to see a holographic screen floating in front of him. The screen prompts him to save/load files and an item shop, as well as his stats. It seems like he's been sucked into some erotic love game, since his stats depend on seducing women and "capturing" them.  
  
After finding a target and going through game-like options, Ryou thinks he knows what he has to do to "capture" his target. Surely he needs to have sex with her, right? And yet when the woman turns out to be a murderer, Ryou finds out the shocking truth: he has to capture these women and unveil their secrets! And if he fails, he dies…
description.ru:
Однажды 25-летний Хасегава Рё просыпается и видит парящий перед ним голографический экран. На экране отображаются опции — сохранить/загрузить, магазин предметов и статистика. Похоже, что его затянуло в какую-то эроге, так как его статистика зависит от соблазнённых им женщин и их «поимки».  
  
Найдя цель и сделав несколько игровых выборов, Рё думает, что уже понял, что надо сделать, чтобы поймать цель. Конечно же, он должен заняться с ней сексом, верно? Но когда женщина оказывается убийцей, Рё узнает шокирующую правду: он должен поймать этих женщин и раскрыть их секреты! А если он потерпит неудачу… он умрет.

altTitles.es: No subestimes al personaje de apoyo

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！

altTitles.en: The Secret of the Chaotic Heavenly Emperor

description.en: Chu Jianqiu, by chance, obtains the Chaos Heavenly Emperor Technique and rises from weakness to embark on a journey across the myriad worlds. With a single thought, he can shatter star seas and rend the heavens. With a single thought, he can slay demons and ghosts, and bury gods and devils! He overlooks the myriad gods and heavens.

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!   
  
5 consecutive updates will be launched after February 16.

Cô Công Chúa Nhỏ Của Kẻ Phản Diện

description.en:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

description.id:
Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

---

description.ru:
Я знала, что моя судьба быть похищенной и убитой потому что мы со святой похожи.
Планировала сбежать до того, как снова встречусь с злым герцогом, но...
Не могу поверить, что я упала у него на глазах!
И он даже спас меня от смерти и удочерил!
Несколько дней я старалась играть в хорошего ребенка, но неожиданно герцог становился дураком, зависимый от своей дочери...

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

---
**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55069889), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8231327), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3885006486)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59664271)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B3%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/392)

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

altTitles.ja: じごくかわいいえんまちゃん

description.en: The daughter of the king of hell meets a young man who exclaims that he was sent to hell by mistake. Somehow she misunderstands him & thinks he proposes to her. She accepts but then the heart of the young man starts beating again & he returns to the mortal world with his new bride following him

title.en: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance Is So BOSS-like, yet Everyone Believes It

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий. Мій дивакуватий друг

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.uk: Акане Нішімура — сором’язлива та похмура дівчинка початкової школи, яка через свою зовнішність має безпідставну жахливу репутацію у своєму класі. Тайо Такада — новий учень, який перевівся з невеликої сільської школи, і якому подобається унікальність Нішімури, яку її однокласники використовують, щоб познущатися з неї, вважаючи, що її «темрява» виглядає моторошно. Через нестримну та фундаментальну радість, яку проявляє Такада, будучи її другом, Нішімура починає розуміти, що бути собою не так вже й погано, як вона думала.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

description.en:
♪'Lalala, the cute puppy will die in a while.'♪  
  
♪'And I feel that fella near waterfall will fall and drown, oh yes, he will.'♪  
  
A karaoke prophet wanders around the town singing weird prophecies into his trusty handy karaoke. No matter how you look at it he's a risky guy, but his sinister prophecies are always right. A puppy that high schooler Yori got from her boyfriend dies. Later, a middle-aged man drowns after falling into a waterfall, a giant fire occurs in the city, and… even more?! The scary, the grotesque, even the ridiculous: a collection of bizarre horror stories!

title.en: The Homeless Saint in the Abandoned Park

altTitles.ja: 廃公園のホームレス聖女

description.en:
Alm, who worked at the temple as a saint, was physically and mentally worn out from the power harassment from the priest Johannes. However, one day, the thin thread she had been holding onto snapped, and she declared her resignation as a saint. 

Alm, who had run away from the temple, bought an abandoned park and decided to live a leisurely life there. On the other hand, the temple - which had lost their saint and was no longer able to function - was in a frenzy!

altTitles.en: Hakkenden: Eight Dogs Of The East

description.en:
Five years ago, all but one of the inhabitants of Ootsuka village perished due to the plague… but the lone survivor wished only to follow her two dear friends to the grave.   
  
To prevent the death of the people who were like family to him, one of the dying boys used his last remaining breath to agree to a proposal put to him by a mysterious fair-haired man. Miraculously restored to health, the trio have since sought refuge in a church near the adjoining village.   
  
Eventually, the Imperial Church begins to express its interest in possessing "Murasame", the demon blade rumored to contain life… but what connection does this legendary sword have with the three survivors of that devastating epidemic?

Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!

The story is about Miyagawa Shota, who just graduated from high school, and left his hometown to work in the famous Tsurumoku Furniture factory outside of Tokyo. In the company dorm, Shota is roomed with Tabatake, the most senior resident of the dorm and the most obnoxious roommate, and Sugimoto, the in-house Casanova. With these two roommates, Shota is constantly caught in awkward situations. Although the manga addresses the issues of making career and love quite seriously, it still succeeds in remaining funny at the same time.

altTitles.en: To Be You, Even Just for a Day

altTitles.th: ชิงชีวิตพลิกลิขิตชะตา

altTitles.es: Quiero ser tú, solo por un día

altTitles.tr: Sadece Bir Günlüğüne Sen Olmak İstiyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi muốn trở thành cô ấy, dù chỉ một ngày

altTitles.uk: Я хочу стати тобою хоча б на один день

description.en: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

title.en: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~Akuma no Niidzuma~

altTitles.ja: 願いを叶えてもらおうと悪魔を召喚したけど、可愛かったので結婚しました　～悪魔の新妻～

altTitles.en: I Summoned the Devil to Grant Me a Wish, but I Married Her Instead Since She Was Adorable ~My New Devil Wife~

altTitles.es-la: Conjuré al diablo para que me cumpliera un deseo, pero me casé con ella porque ella era adorable ~Mi nueva esposa diabólica~
Invoqué al diablo para hacer realidad mi deseo, pero era muy hermosa, así que me casé con ella ~ Mi nueva esposa es el diablo ~

altTitles.vi: Tôi triệu hồi ác quỷ để thực hiện điều ước, nhưng tôi lại muốn cưới cô ấy vì cổ quá xinh đẹp ~ Cô vợ ác quỷ~

altTitles.ru: Я вызвал демонессу, чтобы она исполнила мое желание, но вместо этого женился на ней, потому что она слишком очаровательна~ Моя новая жена Демонесса~

description.en: Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish. He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind, to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand and they go on to future adventures together.
description.ja: 傭兵ギルドに属するテオ・アスペルは、弱すぎるゆえに、 色々なパーティに入ったり追い出されたりを繰り返していた。強くなろうと思い、なんでも願いを叶えてくれるという悪魔を召喚することにするが……。
description.es-la: Un aventurero joven y huérfano trata de conjurar al diablo para obtener ayuda con su disciplina, pues sus habilidades son pocas. El diablo viene en forma de una bella que le ofrece un deseo. Tal fue su enamoramiento con su apariencia que le pide la primera cosa que le vino a la mente, que sea su esposa. Sonrojada, ella acepta su pedido sorpresivo y se dedican a aventurar juntos.
description.pt-br: Theo Aspel, que pertence a guilda de mercenarios, estava entrando e saindo de várias equipes repetidamente por ser muito fraco. Um dia desejando se tornar mais forte ele consegue invocar o diabo que concede qualquer desejo. No momento em que se deparou com o diabo a vontade de "ficar forte" desapareceu e ao ser questionado pelo Diabo sobre seu desejo, Theo responde "Por favor se case comigo!" Conheça a história de um menino herbívoro e da garota diabo carnívora que se tornam um casal e vivem felizes enquanto fazem bagunça por onde passa.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true…

title.en: S Rank Boukensha de Aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con de Shita

altTitles.en: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father

altTitles.ja: Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした

altTitles.ru: Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись

altTitles.zh: 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控

description.en: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
description.ja:
将来を嘱望されていた最年少のＡランク冒険者カイゼルは自分のミスで守るべき村をドラゴンに焼き尽くされてしまう……。絶望の淵に立たされた彼が、焼け野原で見つけたのが村の唯一の生き残りである――３人の赤ん坊だった。希望の光に満ちた赤ん坊を胸に、カイゼルは誓う。

「この子たちは、俺が立派に育て幸せにしてみせる！」

時は経ち、娘たちは彼の尽力の甲斐もあり立派に成長を遂げ、剣技に、経営に、魔法に、稀有な才能を花開かせようとしていた。

だけど、困ったことが1つだけ……。
優秀過ぎる娘たちが父・カイゼルを大好き過ぎて――!?

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Amarimono Isekaijin no Jiyuu Seikatsu: Yuusha ja Nai no de Katteni Yarasete Moraimasu

altTitles.ja: 余りモノ異世界人の自由生活　～勇者じゃないので勝手にやらせてもらいます～

altTitles.en: A Surplus Off-Worlder Lives His Life Freely: I'm No Hero So I'll Do It The Way I Want!
Free Life of a Leisurely Otherworldly Person: I’m Not a Hero, So I’ll Do Whatever I Want

description.en:
Shinichi Sagara, or Shin, works in a corporate sweatshop when he's swept up in an off-world transport meant to bring heroes. Transported to the Kingdom of Tondemo, where they exploit these off-world heroes' abilities, Shin's quick to sense something amiss and flees to another kingdom to begin a happy idle life in a mountain village. One day, Shin meets a nobleman that's locked up in a remote part of a lord's mansion. Will this completely change that quiet life in the countryside?!

(Source: Alpha Manga)
description.ja:
ブラック企業に勤める相良真一は、勇者召喚に巻き込まれて異世界に転移する。ところが、彼が転移した先は異世界人の優れた能力を搾取するトンデモ国家だった。

即座にヤベー臭いを嗅ぎつけたシンは、早々に国外脱出を敢行。他国の山村で念願のスローライフを始める。そんなある日、シンは領主屋敷の離れに幽閉されている貴人と知り合う。

この出会いが、静かな田舎暮らしを一変させることに…!?
description.pt-br: Shinichi Sagara, um guerreiro corporativo. Depois de superar um pesadelo de dias úteis consecutivos, ele finalmente pegou um ônibus para voltar para casa, mas inesperadamente foi transferido para um mundo diferente. Uma jovem deusa de joelhos, “ Sinto muito! Eu sinto Muito! Sinto muito !! ” A história se desenrolou com um clímax. Eu escapei do país que trata os outros mundos como os da empresa e parti para a liberdade. Mudei meu nome de Shinichi para Shin e me mudei para outro país para viver uma vida lenta. Mas eu tive que cuidar do príncipe estúpido, caçar e reunir, reclamar com o príncipe estúpido, elevar minha posição de aventureiro, ouvir a deusa reclamar, disciplinar o príncipe estúpido, reclamar com o príncipe estúpido novamente, depois contribuir para a sociedade…. Então, este é o começo da minha vida lenta em outro mundo.

altTitles.vi: Phù thuỷ và Lính đánh thuê

description.en:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10570/episode/350366)
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
description.fr: Zig, un mercenaire grand et large d'épaules, participe à une chasse aux sorcières. Après un duel acharné avec la sorcière redoutable, il découvre son désir. "Je veux que tu me protèges," demande-t-elle, fatiguée que sa vie soit prise à la légère. Cherchant un endroit pour survivre, la sorcière et le mercenaire tournent leurs regards vers un continent inconnu !
description.ja:
魔女討伐に参加した“双刃の傭兵”ジグ。死闘の果てに見た魔女の素顔は彼の想像とは異なるものだった。

「あなたに、私の護衛を依頼します」

命を狙われない場所を渇望する魔女、シアーシャ。二人は、未知なる異大陸への渡航を決意する。だがそこは、失われた魔術や凶悪な魔獣が蔓延る平穏とは程遠い異世界で…!?
description.vi:
「Phù thủy」――― Tại Lục địa nơi mà Ma thú lẫn Ma thuật đều đã hoàn toàn biến mất, Phù thủy trở thành thứ sinh vật bí ẩn duy nhất còn tồn tại.

Gig Crain, một Lính đánh thuê sở hữu thân hình cường tráng, đang trên đường tiến tới chinh phạt thứ tồn tại đáng sợ từ thời cổ xưa đó. Khi trận giao chiến khốc liệt khép lại, mặc dù đã giành chiến thắng đầy nhọc nhằn, anh cũng chẳng còn mục đích để xuống tay với Phù thủy nữa. Khi Gig không định kết liễu mà cứ thế rời đi, từ sau bóng lưng anh, Phù thủy có một yêu cầu...

"Tôi muốn anh bảo vệ tôi". Cô mong muốn được sống trong cảnh không bị truy đuổi. Tự giằng co ít lâu, Gig cuối cùng cũng đã chấp thuận yêu cầu đó. Tuy nhiên, không có nơi nào trên Lục địa này mà một Phù thủy, biểu tượng của sự sợ hãi, có thể sống yên ổn. Dẫu vậy, khi việc di chuyển giữa các Lục địa trở nên khả thi trong những năm gần đây, Phù thủy và Lính đánh thuê đã quyết định sẽ lên đường đi tới một Lục địa khác.

Tác phẩm Light Novel được chuyển thể từ Web Novel, nay đã có phiên bản Manga cùng tên!!
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

description.en: Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.

altTitles.zh-hk: 八王子名產 天狗之戀

description.en:
The life of a single-minded tengu bride and a lonely young man living together on the premise of marriage!

Kotaro, a lonely young man who has returned to his hometown for some reason, is reunited with Hime, a tengu girl, at Mt. Hime says that they must get married! A one-sided (?) marriage is assumed. Living together with a tengu is full of surprises!
___
**Note**: The series is authored by Nanao Tomo, which is an alias of Tsukizuki Yoshi.
description.es: Kotaro, un solitario joven que ha regresado a su pueblo natal por alguna razón, se encuentra con Hime, una chica Tengu, en el monte. Hime dice que deben casarse. Sin embargo, se trata de un matrimonio unilateral. Vivir con un Tengu está lleno de sorpresas.
description.ja:
一途な天狗の押しかけ花嫁と孤独な青年の結婚前提・同棲ライフ!

訳あって地元に帰って来た孤独な青年コタロウは、高尾山で天狗の少女・ヒメと再会する。ヒメは「ふたりは結婚しなければいけない」と言っていて!?結婚を前提とされた一方的な(?)天狗との同棲生活は驚きだらけ!
description.vi:
Câu chuyện kể về cuộc sống đời thường nhẹ nhàng của đôi vợ chồng nọ, cơ mà đôi vợ chồng ấy không được bình thường lắm...

Koutarou, một kĩ sư phần mềm trẻ tuổi, được anh bạn chí cốt của cậu nhờ làm hướng dẫn viên lên núi Takao một chuyến. Khi lên núi Takao, cậu bắt đầu ngờ ngợ về quá khứ mà bản thân không thể nhớ, chỉ biết rằng là mình từng bị bắt cóc bởi một con Tengu. Những cảm giác kì lạ như thôi thúc anh rời khỏi lại càng khiến anh tò mò hơn, và cuối cùng, anh đã gặp được con Tengu ấy, Nó cảnh báo cậu đừng xuống chân núi đến lần thứ ba. Cậu bỏ ngoài tai cmnl và quyết định làm thêm chuyến xuống đấy nữa. lúc xuống núi, do địa hình hiểm trở mà cậu bị trượt chân ngã, tưởng thế là tàn đời, nhưng lúc tỉnh dậy thì cậu đang nằm dưới gốc cây to tướng, và cảm giác nó thật quen thuộc, cạnh bên cậu là một cô gái, sau bảy phần hỏi han ba phần cảm xúc thì cô ấy đỏ mặt :"Nếu đôi nam thanh nữ tú gặp nhau dưới gốc cây thiêng ba lần thì..." - Sau đó họ cưới nhau... Vâng... Họ cưới nhau đấy...
description.es-la: Kotaro, un solitario joven que ha regresado a su pueblo natal por alguna razón, se encuentra con Hime, una chica Tengu, en el monte. Hime dice que deben casarse. Sin embargo, se trata de un matrimonio unilateral. Vivir con un Tengu está lleno de sorpresas.

description.en:
Kang Yesol, who was transferred to the region of his alma mater, meets Jeong Hanlim, the owner of a bar named Splitter.

Yesol, who had been drinking heavily at the bar, wakes up the next morning at Hanlim's house and runs away in shock upon realizing that he slept with a man.

After realizing he lost an important USB drive, Yesol had no choice but to return to Hanlim. There, he suddenly recognizes that Hanlim is a junior from the baseball team.

Yesol, who has completely forgotten his high school memories, does not think much of Hanlim, who is hostile toward him, but he gradually begins to recall the past that he had once forgotten.

"Sunbae, People like you should just die."

Miya Nekoma made a bold high school debut in an attempt to change from her once "infamously" boring self. As a part of the change, she decided to join the school's Light Music Club, but on her way to sign up she is intercepted by the energetic shakuhachi flute player Hiyo Takemi who introduces her to the world of Wagakki, or traditional Japanese instruments. After the two attend a concert from one of Japan's leading traditional/modern fusion bands, Miya becomes enamored with the Tsugaru-shamisen, a three stringed lute.  
  
With Hiyo by her side, Miya delves into the world of traditional Japanese music as new acquaintances and friends help to make her dream of sharing the sound she loves a reality.

Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: 私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

description.en:
Alex, a holy knight, is suddenly expelled from his adventurers' party.

He tries to live a comfortable life by accepting a quest to cultivate a remote area, but suddenly he is given the extra skill "Slave Release"...?

Summon beautiful girl slaves and cultivate a demon territory overrun with demons! A slow life of harem in a fantasy world is about to begin!
description.ja:
冒険者パーティーから突如追放された聖騎士・アレックス。

僻地の開拓クエストを受けて、悠々自適の生活を送ろうとするが突然エクストラスキル≪奴隷解放≫を授かって―!?

美少女奴隷を召喚して、魔物が跋扈する魔族領を開拓しろ! 異世界ハーレムスローライフ開幕!

description.en: It’s hard dating someone who won’t give you the time of day. Su-ae Shim knows that better than anyone, having dated her indifferent boyfriend, Minu Kang, for years. She sometimes wishes she could be more like her charismatic stepsister, Ra-im, who seems to have it all. But life takes a turn for the weird when Su-ae discovers Jellypop, a sentient flip phone, in her locker. Jellypop has a lot to say about her love life, especially as Su-ae drifts further away from Minu and finds herself running into Minu’s friend, Eunhyeok. Add to the mix a growing suspicion that Minu and Ra-im might be more than friends, and Su-ae might need a miracle to navigate the ups and downs of high school romance!

description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

altTitles.ja: 魔女に首輪は付けられない

description.en: As magic, once monopolized by the nobility, became accessible to the masses, crime rates surged. In response, the Empire established the Magical Crimes Investigation Bureau. Rogue, a detective, is reassigned to the notorious "Sixth Division" due to the schemes of his superior, Veradonna. This division works alongside witches, who once brought disaster to the Empire, to investigate magical incidents. These witches, powerful enough to bring calamity, are imprisoned and have their magic restricted by "collars." However, the witches, led by the "Puppet Demon" Miseria, pay no mind to these restraints and constantly throw Rogue into chaos. "What will you do, Rogue? Shall we consider taking extreme measures?"

Sumioka Hana has lived on her job without making her lover. One day when her overwork peaked, she fell off the platform of the station. When she noticed, she was transferred to the world of fairy tales she read when she was young. Hana, who was injured by herself, is saved by Flora, the main character of her picture book. She was, however, caught by her brother Nicholas, and she was sacrificed to a human-eating monster. When I thought she was sucked by a man who was a vampire, she suddenly got hot in her body ...?

A secret that I, a maid of the imperial palace, accidentally heard… That the runaway fiancée of the prince was actually a man?!

"Please spare my life! I'll do anything!"

"Anything?"

As I desperately nodded my head, the prince gave a chilling smile. There's only one way to not get silenced permanently!

"Then I choose you."

"For what?"

"To be my fiancée."

To become the fiancée (replacement) of the prince.

---
I, who was merely a maid at the royal palace, heard the Crown Prince’s secret by accident. The Crown Prince's fiancée who ran away was actually a man?!

"Please spare me! I'll do anything!"

"Anything?"

The answer I gave in order to survive, the promise that I would do anything, was the beginning of my misery.

"You do it then."

"Do what?"

"Be my fiancée."

There’s only one way to escape death! It's to become the Crown Prince’s fiancée?!!!

"I'll only let you live if you safely survive the party two weeks from now."

I held on while trusting the Crown Prince's words. I got through the ball without any issues but… Why isn't he letting me go?

"Now that he's coming back, I should leave, right?"

"Under whose discretion?"

I thought I was just a substitute.

"You can't go anywhere. You're now my only fiancée."

Why are you… saying that?!!!! I just did my best in order to stay alive… But I ended up touching the Crown Prince's heart?! Atienne's sweet and fierce survival at the royal palace!!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53709175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8356103)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%ED%83%9C%EC%9E%90%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%BD%ED%98%BC%EB%85%80/3080), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60511921)
description.ko:
일개 황궁 시녀였던 내가 우연히 들어 버린 황태자의 비밀.
도망친 황태자의 약혼녀가 사실은 남자였다?!

“살려 주세요! 뭐든 다 할게요!”
“뭐든?”

살기 위해 했던 그 대답,
뭐든지 다 하겠다는 약속으로 인해 불행이 시작되었다.

“그럼 너로 하자.”
“뭘 해요?”
“내 약혼녀.”

살해당할 위기에서 벗어날 방법은 단 하나!
내가 황태자의 약혼녀인 척하라고?!!!

“2주 후 파티만 무사히 치르면 살려 줄게.”

황태자의 그 말만 믿고 열심히 버텼다.
그렇게 무사히 무도회를 치렀는데……
왜 놓아준다는 말이 없지?

“이제 그분도 돌아오실 테니 전 떠나야겠죠.”
“누구 마음대로?”

나는 그저 대역인 줄로만 알았는데.

“넌 아무 데도 못 가. 이제 내 약혼녀는 너뿐이니까.”
얘기가… 왜 그렇게 흘러가는 거죠?!!!

그저 어떻게든 살아남기 위해 몸부림쳤을 뿐인데…
황태자의 마음에 스며들어버렸다?!

아티엔느의 달콤살벌한 황궁에서 살아남기!!

_

[표지 및 타이틀 로고 디자인] 디자인그룹 헌드레드

_

웹툰 [황태자의 약혼녀]는 매주 화요일, 주1회 연재됩니다.

---

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

description.ar:
بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طردت من عائلة آرنو بسبب الترف والفساد . بعد ان تجولت في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش تم اقتيادها إلى دير رث . وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة . الشريرة التي لا تعرف الشرف . كانت هذه بيانكا . هي الحياة قبل عودة " هل هذا حقيقي ؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي ؟ " إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة . هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية ... كل هذا حقيقيا . حقا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى ... ! | سأقوم بأعمال تجارية . الزواج هو أيضا عمل . سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرا جيدا للأعمال التجارية . سيحمي أيضا . لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب الفيكونت اللعين . طفله هذا مهري " للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة . " " كم هو مهر زفافنا ؟ " " 400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة ... كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين . إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك ؟ " وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري .

---
كانت بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طُردت من عائلة أرنو بسبب الترف والفساد.
 بعد أن لم تتجول في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش ، تم اقتيادها إلى دير رثّ.
 وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة.
 الشرير الذي لا يعرف الشرف. كانت هذه هي الحياة قبل عودة بيانكا.

===
 “هل هذا حقيقي؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي؟ ”
 إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة. هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية … كل هذا كان حقيقيًا. حقًا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى …!

 سأقوم بأعمال تجارية. الزواج هو أيضا عمل.

 سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرًا جيدًا للأعمال التجارية. سيحمي طفله مهرتي أيضًا. لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب هذا الفيكونت اللعين.

 “للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة.”

 “كم هو مهر زفافنا؟”

 “400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة … كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين. ”

 “إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك؟”

 وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري.

---

description.cs:
Bianca de Arno bola bezohľadná grófka v Sevranskom kráľovstve, neslávne známa ako zlá a sebecká manželka. Zatiaľ čo jej manžel, gróf Zachar de Arno, statočne riskoval život na bojisku, ona sedela doma a míňala jeho peniaze. Až v posledný deň si Bianka uvedomila chybu svojich činov. Pred smrťou sa modlí za druhú šancu a prebudí sa vo svojom 19-ročnom tele. Vďaka druhej šanci začne Bianca vidieť všetko v novom svetle... počnúc svojím manželom.

description.en:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.

===
“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!

‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.

“How much was my dowry exactly?”

“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”

“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”

---

description.es:
Blanca de Blanchefort. Una mujer que era la esposa de Zachary de Arno, pero que fue expulsada de la familia Arno después de su muerte por motivos de lujo, inmoralidad y lascivia. Una mujer que estuvo a punto de ser expulsada a un monasterio en la destartalada frontera tras vagar sin rumbo debido a la caída de su familia paterna, la familia Blanchefort. Y al final, una mujer que finalmente murió en el frío suelo de piedra. Una mujer sin honor. Esa era la vida antes del regreso de Bianca. *** “¿Es esto real? ¿De verdad he vuelto al pasado? “No es un sueño ni una alucinación. Esta hambre, cansancio, viveza… Todo es real.” “Dios me ha dado otra valiosa oportunidad…!” El matrimonio es un negocio después de todo. Tener un hijo de Zachary será una buena fuente de negocios. Mantendré mi dote. El maldito vizconde no se llevará el territorio de Blanchefort y el territorio de Arno. “Debo tener un hijo con mi esposo, Zachary.” “¿No debería valer la pena?” O seducirlo o persuadirlo… Esa es la cuestión.

---

description.fr:
Quand le Comte d'Arno meurt sur le champ de bataille, il laisse derrière lui sa femme, Bianca d'Arno. Veuve à un si jeune âge et sans héritier, elle est contrainte de vivre dans la pauvreté. Mais un jour, alors qu'elle mourait de faim, elle se réveille dans le passé. Sans aucun doute, Bianca sait ce qu'il lui reste à faire pour survivre: prendre son indépendance financière avant la mort du comte! Mais la tâche s'annonce difficile dans une société où la femme n'a pas son mot à dire...

description.id:
Bianca de Arno, istri Zachary de Arno, adalah istri jahat yang suka berfoya-foya. Setelah suaminya mati, Ia berakhir dibuang dan hidup menderita. Di ambang kematiannya, Bianca kembali ke saat ia berumur 18 tahun. Tapi sama seperti masa lalu, tidak ada seorang pun di county Arno yang menyukai dirinya. Maka itu, Bianca membutuhkan anak yang bisa menjadi penerus yang bisa mengubah posisinya yang dikucilkan. Ia pun bertekad untuk menjalankan tugasnya sebagai istri dan melahirkan penerus count Arno.

---
Bianca de Blanche, FL kita, dibuang oleh keluarga Arno setelah kematian mantan suaminya, Zakari de Arno. Karena keluarganya juga jatuh, akhirnya dia terpaksa tinggal di biara hingga akhir hidupnya. Dan seperti biasa... dia kembali ke masa lalu. Karena Bianca tidak mau mengulang hal yang sama, dia mengajukan pernikahan kontrak dengan mantan suaminya dulu. Dia berpikir, kalau dia punya anak dari Zakari, dia gak akan dibuang lagi oleh keluarga suaminya dan bisa hidup tenang. Apa kehidupan pernikahan kontrak ini akan berjalan mulus seperti yang dia harapkan?

---

description.it:
Bianca de Blanche era la moglie di Zachary de Arno, ma dopo la sua morte fu espulsa dalla famiglia Arno a causa del suo comportamento autoindulgente, frivolo e immorale. Dopo aver vagato inesorabile verso la caduta e la rovina della sua famiglia, la famiglia Blanche, viene portata in uno squallido monastero di periferia. E alla fine... morì sul freddo pavimento di pietra. Una cattiva senza onore: quella era la vita di Bianca prima di tornare indietro nel tempo.

---

贅沢な悪妻、ビアンカ・ド・アルノー。皆に捨てられて死んでいったその時、ビアンカは奇跡的に18歳に回帰する。絶縁状態にある実家、アルノー伯爵領の誰もが私のことを好きではなかった。孤立した私の立場を固めるには跡継ぎが必要… 。「私、貴方の子供を産む準備ができました」「…その話は今度にしよう」「私たちの結婚はおいくらだったでしょうか?値段相応に振舞おうと思うのです。」

description.ko:
비앙카 드 블랑쉐포르.

자카리 드 아르노의 아내였지만 그의 사후, 사치와 배덕함, 그리고 음탕함을 명분으로 아르노가(家)에서 내쳐진 여자. 친가인 블랑쉐포르가(家)의 몰락으로 오갈 데 없이 방황한 끝에 초라한 변방의 수도원으로 쫓겨나다시피 한 여자. 그리고 그 끝에 결국 차가운 돌바닥 위에서 죽게 된 여자.

명예를 모르는 악녀.

그것이 바로 비앙카의 회귀 전 생이었다.

===

“이게 현실이라고? 정말, 과거로 돌아온 거란 말이야?”

꿈도, 환각도 아니다. 이 배고픔은, 피로는, 생생함은….
이 모든 것은 현실이었다.

정말, 정말 그렇다면. 신이 나에게 다시 한 번의 값진 기회를 주신 거라면…!

‘나는 장사를 하는 거야. 결혼도 결국 장사니까. 자카리의 아이는 좋은 장사 밑천이 되어 줄 거야. 내 지참금도 지켜 주겠지. 블랑쉐포르 영지도, 아르노 영지도 그 빌어먹을 자작에게 빼앗기지 않게 될 거야.’

그러려면 그녀의 남편, 자카리의 아이를 낳아야 한다.

“우리의 결혼은 얼마짜리 결혼이었죠?”
“송아지 400마리, 돼지 900마리, 은그릇 100개, 비단 300필, 보석 두 궤짝, 그리고 영지 일부분…. 아르노가의 이 년 치 예산 만큼이었지.”
“그 값은 해야 하지 않겠어요?”

그를 유혹해서든, 설득해서든.

Бьянка де Бланшфор. Жена Захари де Арно, изгнанная из семьи мужа после его гибели. Ей больше некуда было идти, семья Бланшфор разорилась и была отправлена в монастырь на границе королевства. 前生的碧安卡身为阿尔诺伯爵的夫人，把结婚当做了一场生意的她成为了挥霍无度的恶妻，而在丈夫去世之后，身败名裂的她被家族抛弃，最终凄惨而终。一睁眼她重生回到18岁，这一世她决定要好好把握机会，为了逃避惨死的命运，她要做一个懂事的妻子，还要努力怀上阿尔诺家族的继承人…

description.pt-br:
Bianca de Blanche era a esposa de Zachary de Arno, mas após sua morte, ela foi expulsa da família Arno por luxo e imoralidade.

Depois de vagar sem propósito após a queda de seu pai e da família Blanche, ela é levada para um monastério de periferia.

E no final, ela acabou morrendo no chão de pedra fria.

Uma vilã que não conhece a honra. Essa era sua vida antes do retorno de Bianca.

===

“Isto é real? Eu voltei ao passado?”

Não é um sonho ou uma alucinação. Essa fome, fadiga, vivacidade… Tudo isso era real. Realmente, se sim, se Deus me desse mais uma oportunidade preciosa…!

‘Vou fazer negócios. O casamento também é um negócio.’

O filho de Zachary será uma boa fonte de negócios. O filho dele também protegerá meu dote. Nem a fortaleza Blanche, nem a província de Arno serão levadas por aquele maldito visconde.

‘Para fazer isso, tenho que dar à luz o filho de Zachary, meu marido da minha vida anterior.’

“Quanto é o nosso dote de casamento?”

“400 bezerros, 900 porcos, 100 tigelas de prata, 300 sedas, dois baús de joias e uma parte da propriedade… Isso era tanto quanto o orçamento de dois anos da família Arno. “

“Então, eu não deveria ter que pagar por isso?”

Quer eu o tente ou o convença, tenho que ficar com Zachary.

---

description.zh-hk:
奢侈的惡妻，微安卡·德·阿爾諾。在被所有人拋棄並死去的時候，微安卡奇蹟般地回到了18歲。

在宛若絕緣狀態的婆家-阿爾諾伯爵領地裡誰都不喜歡自己。

要鞏固孤立的地位，就需要接班人… “我已經做好給你生孩子的準備了。”

“…那件事以後再說吧。” “我們結婚需要多少錢？我願意出那個價。”

description.en:
The protagonist, Hinata Kuroto, is searching for his sister, who is supposed to have "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind 'Sex & Dungeon!!

(Source: niconico Manga, translated)
___
[Alt Official Raw (niconico Manga)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)
description.id: Si protagonis, Kuroto Hinata, mencari-car adiknya yang seharusnya "pernah ada" tapi kini telah dilupakan semua orang yang ada di sekelilingnya. Dia menerima surat dari murid pindahan cantik, Shiroi Shiuku, yang bertuliskan, "kalo kamu ingin tahu keberadaan adikmu, datanglah ke perpustakaan sepulang sekolah." Saat Kuroto ke perpustakaan, dia menemui Shiroi entah kenapa setengah telanjang menunggu dirinya.
description.ja:
黒戸日向(ルビ：くろどひなた)は“かつて存在した”妹のことを探している。そんな日向のもとに転校生の白井下月(ルビ：しろいしづく)から手紙が届く。

「妹の行方について知りたかったら放課後、図書室まで」

日向は手紙を手に図書室に行くと、そこには半裸の下月が待っていた――。

title.en: Sekai ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou no Tsukaite

altTitles.ja: 世界に一人、全属性魔法の使い手

altTitles.en: The Only in the World, Omnipotent Wizard
The Only Person in the World Able to Use All Magic Attributes

description.en: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
description.id: Setelah kecelakaan lalu lintas, Zenichi Kiyama, seorang pekerja kantoran yang rendah hati, bereinkarnasi sebagai bayi di dunia berbeda yang disebut "kompatibilitas sempurna". Namun, hasil apresiasi atributnya dengan kristal adalah "atribut hitam". .! ?
description.ja: ブラック企業に勤めるサラリーマンの木山全一は交通事故を境に異世界に赤子として転生する。神様曰く、その世界は“相性バッチリ”とのこと。希望に満ちた異世界生活が始まるはずだったが、水晶による属性鑑定を行った結果、魔族の証である《闇属性》を持って産まれたことがわかってしまい…!?

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: あなた達それでも先生ですかっ！

description.en: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!? Under one roof, The forbidden harem romantic comedy begins!!
description.ja: 親が経営する旅館にある日、居候としてやってきたのは学校の先生たち!? 男子高校生・風見ヒロは旅館のため、自分の未来のためにお世話をすることに!? 一つ屋根の下、禁断のハーレムラブコメが開幕!!
description.pl: Pewnego dnia nauczyciele przychodzą jako freeloaderzy do zajazdu prowadzonego przez jego rodziców!? Kazami Hiro, uczeń szkoły średniej, postanawia zadbać o zajazd i swoją przyszłość!? Pod jednym dachem rozpoczyna się zakazana haremowa komedia romantyczna!!

description.en: Kamo and his partner Tora continue to work in the underworld as avengers for hire, taking on jobs from the victims of violent crimes and families seeking vengeance for wrongs done to them.

altTitles.ja: マギクラフト・マイスター

description.en:
There is only one Magi Craft Meister in the world. After the death of the last Meister over one thousand years ago, Jin Nidou was transported to another world in order to succeed her will.

After obtaining the knowledge of the Magi Craft Meister, Jin attempts to use a warp gate but it malfunctions, transporting him to an unknown world. Along with that, an automata he recently restored also uses the warp gate in order to search for her “father”. Thus, the crafting journey of the new Magi Craft Meister begins!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された二堂仁は、世界でただひとりの魔法工学師（マギクラフト・マイスター）の後継者に指名された。先代の知識、研究所にある素材すべてを受け継いだ仁は地球の知識も使い、異世界でモノ作りで人を幸せにしようと奮闘する。

altTitles.fr: J'étais une épée quand je me suis réincarné

altTitles.tl: Naging Espada Ako sa aking Pangalawang Buhay

altTitles.en: I Was a Sword When I Reincarnated

altTitles.th: ซวยเหลือหลายเกิดใหม่กลายเป็นดาบ

description.en: When he realized it, the protagonist was in another world and had become a sword that was stabbed on an altar in a great plain, crowded with devil beast. The world he was in had a game like system; HP, MP, Strength, Vitality, Agility, Intelligence, Dexterity, Titles and Equipment. Following his instinct as a living sword, he traveled to find the one who could be his wielder, until he met with a cat girl that was about to be attacked by a bear type devil beast.
description.es-la: Cuando se dio cuenta, el protagonista ya se encontraba en otro mundo. Se había convertido en una espada que se había clavado en una gran llanura, custodiada por bestias demoniacas. Hasta que su portador la encuentre. Y es en ese momento, cuando una gata negra apareció.
